DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy three dose C-KAD Ophthalmic Solution patient loss visual function due age-related nuclear cataract
DOC.brief_title: Dose-Ranging Study Ophthalamic Solution Patients With Loss Visual Function Due Age-Related Nuclear Cataract
